name: Circle Becket
description: Couples in fours around a big circle; in each four, one couple faces into the centre and the other faces out. [P1] is conventionally on the left of the pair when facing along the direction of travel.

name: Longways set (7–8 couples)
description: 7–8-couple longways set, couples facing the band, [P1] on the left and [P2] on the right of each pair.

name: Longways set (4–6 couples)
description: 4–6-couple longways set, partners facing, [P1] on the left and [P2] on the right when facing the band.
